name: The Indian Gifts
tag_list: indian-gifts, miniature-art, marble-statues, silver-articles, miniature-paintings, indian-handicrafts, room-decor, marble-crafts, herbal-products
overview:
An online marketplace for some really Unique Gift Items and Room Decor options.

Website USP:

Marble Crafts: Is is among the oldest of the arts of India. Marble due to its beauty got a divine place in minds of everyone. There are various stones available but only among all only marble has a slight surface translucency that is comparable to that of human skin. It is this property that gives a marble statue a fine visual beyond its surface and which in turn gives realistic feel when used for crafts work.

Miniature Art / Paintings: Miniature art is extremely minute work, artistically painted with various colors. The features of these paintings are so minute that audience at times must use the magnifier as an aid to expose all of them.

Silver Articles: German Silver (White Metal) furniture, inspired by royalty, was an integral part of the ancient interior designs of palaces and represents a rich statement of class and style. Silver products are unique and has been crafted with high level of expertise and dexterity.

Herbal Products: Handmade herbal Products with no side effects. Everyone knows herbal products are always preferred over products which contains harmful chemicals. The Indian Gifts provides the herbal products which customers are using from years and are satisfied with the results.

Other Handmade Products: There are other handmade products too, which you will surely love.
